name: Forklift Racer
description:
On Your Mark!


Strap in and get ready for Forklift Racer; an all-new, online multiplayer forklift racing simulation.

Customize your forklift, play with friends, and beat your personal best as you speed around the local harbor!

Go!


  • Race around tracks located in the industrial district of Japan & Hong Kong
  • Play online or with friends in 8-player multiplayer or compete against AI in singleplayer!
  • Pickup boosts to give you an edge during gameplay!

    ..with realistic handling and accurate "working" locations..

  • Customize your forklift's paintjob and add a custom backsticker to give your forklift a personal touch!
  • Fine-tune your forklift's engine to make your experience truly unique and take on the community during multiplayer gameplay
